meanings.sent1: The lion looked zootier than the tiger.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit was zootier than mine.
meanings.sent3: The zebra thought it was zootier than the other animals in the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The peacock's feathers were as zootier as a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers made the garden look zootier than ever before.

meanings.sent1: The new car was zootier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: The cake was even zootier with extra frosting.
meanings.sent3: The monkey felt zootier after putting on a fancy hat.
meanings.sent4: The city lights at night were zootier than a starry sky.
meanings.sent5: The music became zootier as the band played louder.
